TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Shapes implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 所有的集合指定工作表上的对象。

span.span: A collection of all the objects on the specified sheet.

remarks.span: <b0>每个<b1></b1>对象代表绘图层，例如自选图形、 任意多边形中的对象、 OLE 对象或图片。</b0><b2><b3>注意</b3>： 如果您想要使用文档中的形状的子集-例如，若要执行某些操作仅对文档的自选图形或仅对选定形状 — 必须构造<b4></b4>要使用包含的形状的集合。 </c2 </b2><b5></b5>

span.para: Each object represents an object in the drawing layer, such as an AutoShape, freeform, OLE object, or picture.

Note: If you want to work with a subset of the shapes on a document — for example, to do something to only the AutoShapes on the document or to only the selected shapes — you must construct a collection that contains the shapes you want to work with.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shape AddConnector (Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoConnectorType Type, float BeginX, float BeginY, float EndX, float EndY);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shape AddConnector([in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.MsoConnectorType Type, [in]float32 BeginX, [in]float32 BeginY, [in]float32 EndX, [in]float32 EndY) runtime managed
Public Function AddConnector (Type As MsoConnectorType, BeginX As Single, BeginY As Single, EndX As Single, EndY As Single) As Shape
public: Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::Shape ^ AddConnector(Microsoft::Office::Core::MsoConnectorType Type, float BeginX, float BeginY, float EndX, float EndY);

param.name: Type
param.span: 所需。

span.span: Required .

param.span: 要添加的连接符类型。

span.span: The connector type to add.

param.span: 可以是下列MsoConnectorType常量之一：msoConnectorElbowmsoConnectorTypeMixedmsoConnectorCurvemsoConnectorStraight

span.span: Can be one of these MsoConnectorType constants:msoConnectorElbowmsoConnectorTypeMixedmsoConnectorCurvemsoConnectorStraight

param.name: BeginX

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 连接符的起点相对于文档左上角的水平位置（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The horizontal position (in points) of the connector's starting point relative to the upper-left corner of the document.

param.name: BeginY

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 连接符的起点相对于文档左上角的垂直位置（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The vertical position (in points) of the connector's starting point relative to the upper-left corner of the document.

param.name: EndX

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 连接符的终点相对于文档左上角的水平位置（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The horizontal position (in points) of the connector's end point relative to the upper-left corner of the document.

param.name: EndY

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 连接符的终点相对于文档左上角的垂直位置（以磅为单位）。

span.span: The veritcal position (in points) of the connector's end point relative to the upper-left corner of the document.

summary.span: 创建一个连接符。

span.span: Creates a connector.

summary.span: 返回对象，表示新连接器。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the new connector.

span.para: 连接符添加后，未连接到任何内容。使用和方法附加到文档中的其他形状的开头和连接符的终点。
将连接符连接到形状，大小和自动调整连接器的位置，如有必要时。因此，如果您打算将连接符连接到其他形状，添加连接器时所指定的大小和位置无关。
When a connector is added, it's not connected to anything. Use the and methods to attach the beginning and end of a connector to other shapes in the document.

When you attach a connector to a shape, the size and position of the connector are automatically adjusted, if necessary. Therefore, if you’re going to attach a connector to other shapes, the position and dimensions you specify when adding the connector are irrelevant.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shape AddCurve (object SafeArrayOfPoints);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Shape AddCurve([in]object SafeArrayOfPoints) runtime managed
Public Function AddCurve (SafeArrayOfPoints As Object) As Shape
public: Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::Shape ^ AddCurve(System::Object ^ SafeArrayOfPoints);

param.name: SafeArrayOfPoints
param.span: 所需的对象。

span.span: Required Object.

param.span: 数组的坐标对指定顶点和控制点的曲线。

span.span: An array of coordinate pairs that specifies the vertices and control points of the curve.

param.span: 您指定的第一个点是起始顶点，和后续两个点是第一段的贝塞尔曲线的控制点。

span.span: The first point you specify is the starting vertex, and the next two points are control points for the first Bézier segment.

param.span: 然后，为曲线的每个其他段，指定一个顶点和两个控制点。

span.span: Then, for each additional segment of the curve, you specify a vertex and two control points.

param.span: 您指定的最后一个点是终顶点的曲线。

span.span: The last point you specify is the ending vertex for the curve.

param.span: 请注意，您必须指定 3n + 1 个点，其中 n 是曲线段的数量。

span.span: Note that you must always specify 3n + 1 points, where n is the number of segments in the curve.

summary.span: 返回对象，表示工作表中的贝赛尔曲线。

span.span: Returns a object that represents a Bézier curve in a worksheet.

param.name: Type
param.span: 所需。

span.span: Required .

param.span: 图表类型。

span.span: The type of diagram.

param.span: 可以是下列MsoDiagramType常数之一：msoDiagramCycle A 与连续周期图表类型的流程图。msoDiagramMixed混合的图表类型。射线层次结构关系图类型。msoDiagramPyramidFoundation 基于关系图类型。msoDiagramRadial显示的核心元素的关系图类型。msoDiagramTarget显示某个目标步骤图表类型。msoDiagramVenn图类型显示的各元素之间的重叠的区域。

span.span: Can be one of these MsoDiagramType constants:msoDiagramCycle A process diagram with a continuous cycle diagram type.msoDiagramMixed A mixed diagram type.msoDiagramOrgChart A hierarchical relationship diagram type.msoDiagramPyramid A foundation based relationships diagram type.msoDiagramRadial A diagram type showing relationships of a core element.msoDiagramTarget A diagram type showing steps toward a goal.msoDiagramVenn A diagram type showing areas of overlap between elements.

param.name: Left

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 相对于工作表的左上角的图表的左上角的位置 （以磅为单位）。

span.span: The position (in points) of the upper-left top of the diagram relative to the upper-left corner of the worksheet.

param.name: Width

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 以磅为单位给出图表的宽度。

param.name: Height

span.span: Required Single.

param.span: 图表，以磅为单位的高度。

span.span: The height of the diagram, in points.

summary.span: 创建图表。

span.span: Creates a diagram.

summary.span: 返回对象，表示新的图表。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the new diagram.

param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: The file from which the object is to be created.

param.span: 可选的对象。

param.span: 图标显示在更改图标对话框 （可从访问对象对话框中显示为图标复选框已选中） 顺序相对应的指定文件中的图标次序。

span.span: The order of icons in the specified file corresponds to the order in which the icons appear in the Change Icon dialog box (accessed from the Object dialog box when the Display as icon check box is selected).

param.name: SaveWithDocument
param.span: 确定是否将已链接的图片插入到文档一起保存。如果为 msoFalse 时链接到文件，则此参数必须是 属性值为 msoTrue 。

param.name: Top

param.name: Height

span.span: Determines whether the picture should be compressed when inserted.

span.para: 使用方法将段添加到任意多边形。在任意多边形添加至少一个段后，您可以使用方法将转换到FreeformBuilder对象对象已FreeformBuilder对象中已定义的几何描述。

Use the method to add segments to the freeform. After you have added at least one segment to the freeform, you can use the method to convert the FreeformBuilder object into a object that has the geometric description you’ve defined in the FreeformBuilder object.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCreator Creator { get; }
.property instance valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCreator Creator
Public ReadOnly Property Creator As XlCreator
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlCreator Creator { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlCreator get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，该整数指示在其中创建了此对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which this object was created.

span.para: 如果对象在 Microsoft Excel 中创建的此属性返回的字符串 XCEL，这相当于十六进制数字 5843454 c。
Creator属性用于在 Microsoft Excel 中用于的 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Excel 的创建者代码 XCEL。
If the object was created in Microsoft Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C.
The Creator property is designed to be used in Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Excel has the creator code XCEL.
